main event: An unidentified oval-shaped object was sighted near Hillsboro, Oregon on October 1, 1964.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be 15-20 feet long and floating about 300 feet off the ground.
The object gave off a bright orange glow but made no sound.
The sighting lasted for several minutes before the object disappeared over the hills.
The weather was clear with no wind at the time of the sighting.
This report appears to be part of the Project Blue Book record, a U.S. Air Force program that investigated UFOs.
